item.title: Micah add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "A person hears only what they understand." -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Micah add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Beauty is a manifestation of secret natural laws, which otherwise would have been hidden from us forever. " -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Micah add a quote by Goethe, Schiller, Hebel, et al
item.description: "Talent develops in solitude, character develops in the stream of life." -- Goethe, Schiller, Hebel, et al

item.title: Micah add a quote by Maurice Merleau-Ponty
item.description: "The world is... the natural setting of, and field for, all my thoughts and all my explicit perceptions. Truth does not inhabit only the inner man, or more accurately, there is no inner man, man is in the world, and only in the world does he know himself. " -- Maurice Merleau-Ponty

item.title: Micah add a quote by Billy Collins
item.description: "...pleasure, of course, is a slippery word.... Our pleasures ultimately belong to us, not to the pleasure's source." -- Billy Collins

item.title: Micah add a quote by Pattiann Rogers
item.description: "Don't you know This is precisely what I seek, mad myself To envelope every last drupe and pearl shaped ovule, Every nip and cry and needle-fine boring, every drooping, Spore-rich tassle of oak flower, all the whistling, Wing-beating, heavy-tipped matings of an entire prairie Of grasses, every wafted, moaning seed hook You can possibly manage to bring to me, That is exactly what I contrive to take you into my arms With you, again and again." -- Pattiann Rogers

item.title: Micah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Micah add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin
